channel.title: 637 Webclient help?
channel.description:
I put up a webclient with dementhium cache and the armor disappears when it it worn. Running on a 637 source and client. I put my jar onto my website and when a character wears armor, this happens: https://www.dropbox.com/s/5k7sc5e8us...Glitch%201.png
This is my Html: <center> <applet name="SERVER NAME" width="765" height="503" archive="https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/mrtng5erqbea5r5/RunClient.jar?token_hash=AAGKMJCZrk8J98_MAMwJcUkRy vyF4hsiXsTwjYCfmkypag&dl=1" code="RunClient.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"/> </applet></center>
I just need help fixing the invisible armor glitch. Please reply to this thread! Thanks.
